mapper.insert: INSERT INTO request( item_id, alba_id, request_amount, request_date, request_type, request_status, created_at, updated_at ) VALUES ( #{itemId}, #{albaId}, #{requestAmount}, #{requestDate}, #{requestType}, #{requestStatus}, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP )
mapper.update: UPDATE request r JOIN item i ON r.item_id = i.item_id AND r.is_active = b'1' SET r.is_active = b'0', r.updated_at = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE r.request_id = #{requestId} AND i.store_id = #{storeId}

UPDATE request r JOIN item i ON r.item_id = i.item_id AND r.is_active = b'1' AND r.request_status = 'WAIT' SET r.request_type = #{dto.requestType}, r.request_amount = #{dto.requestAmount}, r.alba_id = #{dto.albaId}, r.request_date = #{dto.requestDate}, r.updated_at = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE r.request_id = #{requestId} AND i.store_id = #{storeId}

UPDATE request r JOIN item i ON r.item_id = i.item_id AND r.is_active = b'1' SET r.request_status = #{dto.requestStatus}, r.updated_at = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE r.request_id = #{requestId} AND i.store_id = #{storeId}
